body.name: Force of Justice: A Legal Thriller (Brad Madison Legal Thriller Series Book 1)

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #7,857 in Kindle Store (See Top 100 in Kindle Store) #30 in Pulp Thrillers #32 in Financial Thrillers (Books) #62 in Private Investigator Mysteries (Books)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loved it! Fast paced story with lots of twists and turns. The crazy life's of the rich and famous is just more than most people can imagine. Glad there are a few good ones left that care about others. Suspenseful with many twists right up until the end. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The author does a good job with some nice twists and turns, especially during the trial phase of the book and a great surprise at the end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: What a book! Speechless!One of the best I’ve read in years!The twist at the end? Unreal.Highly, highly do I recommend….

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A thriller it is not
reviews.reviewText: Hoped to find a new author to enjoy but JJ Miller is not it. For a thriller it was pretty bland. Kind of like watching a Matlock series on TV. Broad brush generalizations with no real development of characters. And since this is the first book in this series, I would expect some drama, but found nothing that will cause me to buy book two. Middle school readers may like it, but nothing for an adult reader.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Full of unexpected plot twists; I loved this book!
reviews.reviewText: Surprisingly fresh storyline, particularly with this being Miller's first book. Madison, the main character, is well a developed. The author kept me engaged until the end. Looking forward to reading the next in this series.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WOW. Finally a true legal thriller
reviews.reviewText: I love legal thrillers and have since I read my first James Patterson book years ago. I bags read so many books by so many different authors and I did like some. But I almost quit reading that genre because they all seemed to be the same and I found myself skipping parts like when the attorney gives the opening statement at trial. I now realize those parts were just fillers to make the book longer -and more boring. J.J. Miller did not need any fillers in this book. Everything was perfect: grammer, mystery, edge of your seat. I have already down loaded the next book in the Madison series

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Thoroughly enjoyed all the drama all the way to the very unexpected end of the book. Looking forward to the next book in the series.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good book, but...
reviews.reviewText: This was entertaining, my first read by this author. I'll probably buy another book by the author, J. J. Miller. Not having read "about the author" notes, I'm not certain whether he writes primarily for a British audience but, based on quite a few British english uses throughout the book, I think he does.That's probably the reason for 4 stars instead of 5. There were many instances where I had to look things up in order to understand the author's meaning. That's not a very big deal but the author might consider two versions of his books; one for American readers and one for British. (If the author or his editors are interested, I have a couple of pages of things I looked up for clarity.)All in all, a good read.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Enjoyed this legal thriller ... decent plot and well written book blablabla blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah

reviews.reviewTitle: Force Of Justice by J.J. Miller - Awesome read!
reviews.reviewText: Couldn't put the book down. Awesome legal thriller and never imagined the ending. J.J. Miller has moved to the top of my fav authors. Sad to finish Book 1, but I have bought the next 3 books and will be starting to read Book 2 shortly. Strongly recommend this book for everyone who likes a really good read.
Loved this book. Good storyline and kept me guessing the whole way through. Can’t wait to read the next instalment

reviews.reviewTitle: miller gives new meaning to an inspiring legal thriller.
reviews.reviewText: It was exciting and attention-getting from the get-go. Charters were well developed and there were many fine twists and turns. The emotional let-down followed by the big save at the end was worth the rude. Thoroughly enjoyed the book.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Have to give it four stars easy reading with a good story. Would definitely recommend it brilliant ending what more can you say.
